content.description: Ice climbing area accessed by walking up river on Fox Creek where you can find a wide waterfall. During peak season this fall can accommodate larger climbing parties ( easily 3 top rope set-ups). While many choose to lead, it is possible to scramble up the hill to the left of the falls. At the top of the falls there is a sturdy tree with a chain that can be used to build an anchor (there are leaver-beaners but upon last check could use some replacing).
